subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With the crowd waving maple leaf flags and chanting. “Go Canada, go!,” the Canadian men’s hockey team got a hat trick from Jarome Iginla in a rout.
snippet: With the crowd waving maple leaf flags and chanting. “Go Canada, go!,” the Canadian men’s hockey team got a hat trick from Jarome Iginla in a rout.
